attributes.action: Purchase a property to be used by MPs in their constituencies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to prevent more distaste from the public regarding second homes,i propose that the government purchase a home in each constituency to be used by mps.the property will then remain under the ownership of the government,with no mp making a profit from taxpayers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
